reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and explains concepts clearly. His lectures are engaging, but his exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is amazing! She makes complex topics simple and is always willing to help after class.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures can be a bit dry, but the material is well-organized. His lab sessions are more interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is a fantastic storyteller. She brings history to life with her engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows his stuff, but his teaching style is very technical and hard to follow. Wouldn't recommend if you're new to programming.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is passionate about literature and encourages deep analysis. Her assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are informative, but he tends to go off on tangents. The exams are fair, but the grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is excellent at making economics interesting and relatable. Her classes are a must-take!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Harris encourages critical thinking and class discussions. His exams are tough, but he's fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is a wonderful instructor. Her lectures are engaging, and she is very approachable for help.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's lectures are thought-provoking but can be a bit abstract. Not an easy A, but you'll learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is very knowledgeable and makes the material relevant to today's society. Her classes are insightful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's lectures are very dense and hard to follow. Not the best for students new to anthropology.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Allen is passionate about art and her enthusiasm is contagious. Her classes are a visual treat.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Young's classes are challenging, and he doesn't offer much help outside of lectures. You need to be self-motivated.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. King is great at breaking down complex musical concepts. Her classes are both challenging and fun.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez makes physics approachable and interesting. He is always willing to help students understand difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Moore is an excellent teacher. Her labs are well-organized, and she explains the material clearly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's lectures are very technical and hard to follow. His exams are difficult, and he doesn't curve grades.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Thomas is incredibly knowledgeable and makes history fascinating. Her exams are tough, but fair.
